languages.text: {n}После недолгих раздумий она коротко кивает:{/n} "Чтобы облечь всю истину этого мира в скупой язык, привычный твоему слуху, мне понадобится время. Позже я сама приду к тебе с ответом".

{n}After thinking for a moment, she nods.{/n} "I will need time to put the entire truth of this world into the meagre language to which your ears are accustomed. When I find my answer, I will pay you a visit."
languages.original_text: {n}После недолгих раздумий она коротко кивает:{/n} "Чтобы облечь всю истину этого мира в скупой язык, привычный твоему слуху, мне понадобится время. Позже я сама приду к тебе с ответом".

traits.locale_text: {n}After thinking for a moment, she nods.{/n} "I will need time to be able to put the entire truth of the world into the primitive language you are used to. When I find my answer, I will pay you a visit myself."

{n}After thinking for a moment, she nods.{/n} "I will need time to be able to put the entire truth of the world into the primitive language you are used to. When I find my answer, I will pay you a visit myself."

{n}After thinking for a moment, she nods.{/n} "I will need time to put the entire truth of this world into the meagre language to which your ears are accustomed. When I find my answer, I will pay you a visit."

{n}After thinking for a moment, she nods.{/n} "I will need time to put the entire truth of this world into the meagre language to which your ears are accustomed. When I find my answer, I will pay you a visit."

{n}After thinking for a moment, she nods.{/n} "I will need time to put the entire truth of this world into the meagre language to which your ears are accustomed. When I find my answer, I will pay you a visit."

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特思索片刻之后，点了点头。{/n}“我需要些时间，以便用你们惯于使用的粗陋语言描述这个世界的全部真相。等我做好准备之后，我会去找你的。”
languages.original_text: {n}After thinking for a moment, she nods.{/n} "I will need time to put the entire truth of this world into the meagre language to which your ears are accustomed. When I find my answer, I will pay you a visit."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特思索片刻之后，点了点头。{/n}“我需要些时间，以便用你们惯于使用的粗陋语言描述这个世界的全部真相。等我做好准备之后，我会去找你的。”

languages.text: {n}Tras pensarlo durante un instante, asiente.{/n} «Necesitaré tiempo para plasmar toda la verdad de este mundo usando el exiguo lenguaje al que están acostumbrados tus oídos. Cuando tenga la respuesta, vendré a hacerte una visita».
languages.original_text: {n}After thinking for a moment, she nods.{/n} "I will need time to put the entire truth of this world into the meagre language to which your ears are accustomed. When I find my answer, I will pay you a visit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras pensarlo durante un instante, asiente.{/n} «Necesitaré tiempo para plasmar toda la verdad de este mundo usando el exiguo lenguaje al que están acostumbrados tus oídos. Cuando tenga la respuesta, vendré a hacerte una visita».

languages.text: {n}Elle réfléchit quelques instants et hoche la tête.{/n} « Il me faudra un peu de temps pour réussir à traduire la vérité de ce monde dans la langue étriquée à laquelle vos oreilles sont habituées. Quand j'y serai parvenue, je reviendrai vous voir. »
languages.original_text: {n}After thinking for a moment, she nods.{/n} "I will need time to put the entire truth of this world into the meagre language to which your ears are accustomed. When I find my answer, I will pay you a visit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle réfléchit quelques instants et hoche la tête.{/n} « Il me faudra un peu de temps pour réussir à traduire la vérité de ce monde dans la langue étriquée à laquelle vos oreilles sont habituées. Quand j'y serai parvenue, je reviendrai vous voir. »

languages.text: {n}Nach kurzem Nachdenken nickt sie.{/n} "Ich werde Zeit brauchen, um die gesamte Wahrheit dieser Welt in die dürftige Sprache zu bringen, an die Eure Ohren gewöhnt sind. Wenn ich meine Antwort habe, werde ich Euch besuchen."
languages.original_text: {n}After thinking for a moment, she nods.{/n} "I will need time to put the entire truth of this world into the meagre language to which your ears are accustomed. When I find my answer, I will pay you a visit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach kurzem Nachdenken nickt sie.{/n} "Ich werde Zeit brauchen, um die gesamte Wahrheit dieser Welt in die dürftige Sprache zu bringen, an die Eure Ohren gewöhnt sind. Wenn ich meine Antwort habe, werde ich Euch besuchen."

languages.text: {n}しばらく考えてから、彼女は頷いてみせた。{/n}「この世界の真実のすべてを、お前たちに耳馴染みのあるわずかな言語に置き換えるには時間が必要だ。答えが見つかったら、お前を訪ねることにしよう」
languages.original_text: {n}After thinking for a moment, she nods.{/n} "I will need time to put the entire truth of this world into the meagre language to which your ears are accustomed. When I find my answer, I will pay you a visit."

traits.locale_text: {n}しばらく考えてから、彼女は頷いてみせた。{/n}「この世界の真実のすべてを、お前たちに耳馴染みのあるわずかな言語に置き換えるには時間が必要だ。答えが見つかったら、お前を訪ねることにしよう」

languages.original_text: {n}After thinking for a moment, she nods.{/n} "I will need time to put the entire truth of this world into the meagre language to which your ears are accustomed. When I find my answer, I will pay you a visit."

languages.text: {n}Biraz düşündükten sonra başını sallıyor.{/n} "Bu dünyadaki tüm gerçeği senin kulaklarının duymaya alışkın olduğu zayıf dilde kelimelere dökebilmek için zamana ihtiyacım olacak. Cevabı bulduğumda seni tekrar ziyaret ederim."
languages.original_text: {n}After thinking for a moment, she nods.{/n} "I will need time to put the entire truth of this world into the meagre language to which your ears are accustomed. When I find my answer, I will pay you a visit."
